subject: UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: The club lost, 3-1, to Napoli on Tuesday and the biggest question is whether André Villas-Boas will be the manager when the teams play the second leg in England.
snippet: The club lost, 3-1, to Napoli on Tuesday and the biggest question is whether André Villas-Boas will be the manager when the teams play the second leg in England.
